DOC.brief_summary: This study design assess strategy use spinal cord stimulation improve ability move spinal cord injure human .
DOC.detailed_description: An epidural stimulation device test determine motor function improve .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Stable medical condition without cardiopulmonary disease dysautonomia would contraindicate hand/arm movement 2 . No severe cardiopulmonary disease severe bradycardia , severe autonomic dysreflexia , and/or Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease . 3 . No painful musculoskeletal dysfunction , unhealed fracture , contracture , pressure sore , infection might interfere upper extremity training 4 . No clinically significant depression ongoing drug abuse 5 . No current antispasticity medication regimen 6 . Nonprogressive SCI C5 7 . Must receive botox injection prior six month 8 . Be unable grip move independently 9 . Be least oneyear post injury 10 . Must least 18 year age 11 . Segmental reflex remain functional lesion 12 . Female subject childbearing potential must pregnant must use medically acceptable method contraception 13 . No current implant ( ) neurostimulators , cardiac pacemaker , defibrillator , shunt , stent , aneurysm clip , must future exposure diathermy follow implantation 14 . No coagulopathy , cardiac risk factor , significant medical risk factor surgery 15 . Must involve another clinical trial 16 . Must disorder condition would require MRI monitor None long inclusion criterion meet .
